welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Valdivia, Chile! Known for its beautiful rivers, charming architecture, and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that this vibrant city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.description: The main terminal at Pichoy Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pichoy Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
